title: Everyday Backpack: Tips, Features, and Functions
description:
Buy now at https://peakdesign.com/everyday-backpack

Dive deep into the features and functionality of the Everyday Backpack (20L and 30L) with head designer Art Viger.

If you're not all about sitting through a 30-minute video, below is a list of pertinent time stamps so you can quickly get to the section you're most interested in.

Introduction (0:00)
Side Access (0:30)
Basic Divider Overview (1:07)
Divider Setup Part 1 (3:17)
Divider Setup Part 2 (4:41)
Divider Setup Part 3 (5:04) Passthrough Long Lens (6:10)
Divider Setup Part 4 (6:28) Pockets and Holding Small Lenses
Common Camera Setups (7:03) Long Lens
Common Camera Setups (7:23) Holy Trinity (30L Backpack)
Common Camera Setups (7:58) Passthrough Camera Grip
Daily Carry Part 1 (8:25) Single Divider
Daily Carry Part 2 (9:03) Two Dividers
Interior Pocket Overview (9:36)
Top Access MagLatch (10:20)
Laptop Compartment (11:46)
Security Zipper Overview (13:45)
Side Pocket Overview Part 1 (15:25) Tripod Carry
Side Pocket Overview Part 2 (16:33) Single Leg Tripod Carry
Key Tether (16:54)
External Carry Part 1 (17:31) Including Vertical Carry
External Carry Part 2 (19:06)
Drone Carry Part 1 (19:30) Internal Carry
Drone Carry Part 2 (19:54) External Carry
Luggage Passthrough (21:06)
Shoulder and Sternum Strap Overview (21:37)
Sternum Strap Closer Look (23:46)
Waist Belt Overview (24:42)
Capture Clip Attachment (26:27)
Why the bag stands up (27:15)
Bag Care and Maintenance (28:09) 
Conclusion (28:58)
